Dear Jack,
Your father and I are going away for the week. We trust that you will be responsible, get your homework done, and go to bed on time. See you in a week!
Mom

All that was in there was a small blue rock with a slight glow and a note. The note read:

Your Destiny

Now, all he had to do is try to recover from all the scars and wounds which he had gotten at school, and hope that he could just defend himself from the bullies during the rest of the week so that he wouldn't get banged up even more! Going to school was no longer a matter of getting an education, it was a matter of surviving and staying alive and getting home in one piece!

Then, he looked down and saw the bruises on his left leg. He had gotten kicked and stomped on a few times, since two thugs tried to beat him up. Cowards! Jack wished he could become stronger so he could defend himself and others better from these thugs who were making life miserable for him and his friends at school.

"So, what the heck is this thing for?" Jack sighed. "Why would someone mail me a rock?"

But, while he was holding the rock in his paw, he noticed that the rock began to let off a bright, blue glow of nice, blue light. The light was surrounding the rock on all sides, like it was some sort of precious metal. It was shining like it was some sort of diamond or something.

"Wow! Maybe this thing is worth a lot of money?" Jack wondered, as the glow intensified even more, the longer he held the rock in his paw. "How pretty!"

But the intense blue glow continued to grow, and Jack saw that his paw, then his arm, and then his chest, and finally his entire body began to glow from the same blue light!

"Oh man! Now I'm glowing, too! What is this? It doesn't hurt or anything... It feels nice and soothing to me..." Jack wondered to himself.

The tingling sensation concentrated in Jack's muscles and around his wounds. Jack suddenly felt the healing powers of the rock, and the wound on his leg began to heal, and the swelling in his eye began to diminish quickly. In fact, Jack quickly got up and walked over to the bathroom, where he noticed that the black eye was gone, and his leg was no longer hurting as he was walking on it!

"Cool! I'm feeling fine again! The wounds and scars are gone! I like this!" Jack grinned, as he looked down at the rock in his paw.

But then, he saw something else in the reflection of the bathroom mirror: His muscles were slowly inflating all over his body!

"Heyyyy! Arrgmmm! I'm... getting... stronger!!!!" Jack growled as he flexed his arms. He must have gained about 20 pounds of muscle already, and he was still growing!

His chest was pushing out slowly as his pectorals grew bigger and rounder, making his shoulders ever wider. His biceps continued to increase in size while mighty abs popped up over his torso. His quads were much bigger than before and his calves were already bulging out of the back of his legs!

"Hey! This rock is making my muscles grow! I wonder how big I'm gonna get?" Jack wondered, as his muscles continued to increase in size as he slowly gained 30 pounds... 40 pounds... 50 pounds of muscle...

Jack just stood there, holding the rock in his paw until the growth stopped...

Suddenly, Jack began to feel a warm sensation spreading through his body. He stopped walking, confused as to what was going on. Little did he know, if Jack's muscles were used enough, the magic of the orb made them grow bigger to compensate for the exertion. Jack was having another growth spurt!

Realizing what was going on, Jack quickly looked around, and seeing no one, he ducked into a nearby alleyway. He couldn't figure out what was going on, but he didn't mind it. Being stronger had gotten him everything he had ever wanted, so he figured more muscle could only help.

The warm sensation finally became strong enough and Jack watched in excitement as his muscles began to grow again. His meaty pecs pushed out more against his shirt, ripping it in places. His abs hardened and separated, forming an eight-pack. Jack flexed his calves and watched as they inflated to soccer ball size. Jack's eyes moved up to his favorite muscles: the biceps. They inflated from their impressive baseball size to monstrous basketballs, causing his forearms to thicken and his arm to look like an orange pipe. Finally, Jack felt himself shoot upward to make room for his new muscle, stopping at a towering 6' 6".

Jack stood and breathed heavily, the growth taking energy out of him. Once he had regained his composure, he was able to marvel at the sheer size of his muscles. Before, he could have matched up with any bodybuilder: now, he surely outclassed all of them. However, as he flexed his giant bicep, he realized that the growth had torn through even his XL clothes, leaving him without a shirt and with only the Speedo to cover his massive crotch. Blushing, Jack raced out of the alley, wondering how he was going to explain this to his mom.
1153112.title: Jack starts growing again.

choices: Jack lifts weights at the gym.
Jack shows his friend the rock.
11531121.content:
When Jack got home after the second growth, his parents were shocked and questioned his new muscle. Jack simply stated that he had been working out more lately, and that he was going shopping for new clothes. His parents accepted the explanation, not exactly being the brightest foxes out there.

Jack went to school the next day, wearing a super tight black t-shirt and shorts which were clenched tightly to his calves: it had taken him a while, but he had manage to find a store that sold XXXL clothes to fit his new physique. Jack noticed that he was REALLY turning heads now: many people were coming up to him to compliment his new muscles.

"Looks like someone's been working out lately," Brett, one of Jack's wrestling buddies, said as Jack walked past.

The attention didn't stop throughou the day, with even teachers stopping to compliment his muscles. Jack enjoyed the attention, and he realized that he was right when he had thought that his muscle would only benefit his life more.

Finally, Jack reached the end of the school day, which meant soccer practice. Jack squeezed into his tight (but sexy looking) soccer uniform and ran out onto the field with the rest of the team. He felt somewhat out of place, dwarfing every player by at least a foot and outmuscling them by far. Coach Torres announced a scrimmage and Jack was in the game.

As Jack recieved a pass, he looked up and saw three defenders coming towards him, knowing about his incredible soccer ability. Jack began to doubt that the new muscle would help with soccer, but he had to try.

Jack dribbled towards the defenders and started doing fancy footwork to get around them. Surprisingly, he moved even quicker than he had before and he easily sidestepped the flabbergasted defenders. New confidence rising, Jack started sprinting towards the goal, noting that he even seemed a lot faster as he flew down the field. He got around a few more defenders until he had a clear shot at the goal. Pushing all of his power into his leg, he kicked the ball with great force as it sped towards the goal, the goalie diving to try to save it.

GOAL!!!

Jack and his teammates cheered as the ball easily sailed into the net. Jack didn't know how, but his muscles had actually sped him up and made him better at sports! He reminded himself to check out the orb, but he was also caught up in the celebration of his goal.

Jack went on to play an amazing game, scoring four more goals and shutting the other team out before practice ended. Coach Torres gathered everyone around, looking extremely excited.

"With Jack on our team, we can't lose!" he exclaimed. The rest of the team cheered in agreement, patting Jack on the back and congratulating him as they all left for home. Jack couldn't even think of how his life could be better.
11531121.title: Jack's sports abilities improve greatly!

Tommy grows 50% as strong as Jack.
115311212.content:
Jack was walking down the street deep in thought when suddenly he heard some shouting his name. He turned and smiled as he saw it was Tommy, another fox on the soccer team. Tommy was another fox anthro that Jack had become great friends with ever since he joined the team. Tommy wasn't as shrimpy as Jack was before his growth, but he still had little muscle on him.

"Hey Jack, great game back there!!" Tommy said excitedly. Jack blushed a little. "Oh, it wasn't that great," he said shyly.

"Are you kidding me? You rocked out there!" Tommy exclaimed. Jack smiled and continued the conversation as the two foxes walked down the street.

Finally, the two were standing in front of Jack's house. Jack was about to say good-bye to Tommy when he noticed Tommy looked a bit nervous.

"Hey Jack, I've been meaning to ask you something..." Tommy said.

"What is it Tommy?" Jack asked.

"Well... I've seen you around school before, and I don't even remember seeing you with any muscle at all! Then you show up like this and well... I'm just kind of confused," Tommy spurted out.

Jack thought for a second and considered lying to Tommy. But he knew Tommy was a good friend, and it felt wrong lying to him. Jack decided to tell Tommy the truth.

"Hey Tommy, can you keep a secret?" Jack asked, lowering his voice. Tommy nodded, perplexed. "Good, then follow me," Jack said, leading Tommy into his house.

Luckily, neither of Jack's parents were home yet, leaving Jack and Tommy with the house all to themselves. Jack motioned for Tommy to follow him upstairs.

Once upstairs, the two friends stepped into Jack's room. Jack's room was pretty ordinary, except for the stuff he now had for his musculature. He had acquired a weight bench and some heavy dumbbells, along with posters hung on the walls showing top bodybuilders posing and flexing their muscles. Jack went over to his drawer and pulled out the rock, turning back to Tommy.

Tommy looked at Jack, confused. "A rock? What does that have to do with anything?" he asked.

"Well, this may seem hard to believe..." Jack paused to consider things before continuing. "... but this rock showed up at my doorstep, and it made me grow big! Then, yesterday, I had another growth spurt, and I ended up like this!" Jack exclaimed flexing a bicep which strained against his super tight soccer uniform.

Tommy paused for a moment, not knowing how to respond. "... I think I believe you," he said.

Jack was actually shocked at Tommy's answer. "Really? You believe me?" he asked in shock.

Tommy shrugged. "Yeah. Well, it's not like there's any other explanation. Plus you're a really great friend and I trust you." he said.

Jack smiled. "Well, thanks Tommy." he said.

"Hey Jack, could I possibly hold the rock?" Tommy asked.

Jack nodded and handed the rock to Tommy. Suddenly, a bright light came out of the rock and enveloped Tommy. Jack realized that the rock was going to make Tommy grow!
115311212.title: Jack shows his friend the rock.

choices: Jack and Tommy handle their first emergency together.
Jack and Tommy play in a soccer team  together.
1153112122.content:
Tommy just stared with wide eyes at the strange, blue rock which he held in his hand. The glow quickly intensified, spreading from his arm down his chest and then to his other arm, making its way down his torso and finally passing down both of his legs.

"What... What is this?" he wondered, as he was overcome by that tingling feeling that Jack was familiar with.

"Don't more. Just stand still and you'll see..." Jack assured his friend calmly. "Don't be afraid; it won't hurt at all!"

Tommy's pectorals suddenly began to swell and his biceps quickly inflated slightly, already making him look much more muscular than he was before. His quads gained several pounds of muscle while his calves inflated from the back of his legs. He had quickly gained over thirty pounds of muscle!

"Ohhhhhhh man! Jack! You're kidding me!" Tommy gasped, as he flexed his arm and made a ball of muscle rise up on his arm.

"Feels good, huh?"

"Yeah... This is great! I'm not as big or strong as you, but... I'm a LOT bigger than I was a minute ago!"

"Well, you can help me during sporting events and you can help me when I need to assist people and when I need to perform heroics!" Jack smiled.

"Sure! My pleasure!" Tommy smiled, as he gave Jack a big hug.

Jack knew he had done a nice thing by sharing the rock with Tommy, who was his best friend. Now, he didn't have to be the strong guy all by himself. he actually had a sidekick!
1153112122.title: Tommy grows 50% as strong as Jack.

choices: Jack and Tommy stop a runaway train
Jack and Tommy rescue some kids left stranded on a boat
11531121221.content:
Jack and Tommy had just left their school after a grueling workout when a small sports car had raced past them, traveling at high speed! The boys looked over and realized that there were only two people sitting in the red convertable, which seemed to be going faster and faster!

"Gosh! Those kids are going awfully fast, don't you think?" Tommy remarked.

"Either they're in a big hurry, or..." Jack pondered out loud.

"Or, what?"

"Their brakes just went out! Quick! Run after that car!" Jack shouted, as he began to run after the small red convertable.

Tommy quickly followed Jack and the two boys were quickly catching up to the runaway car. Jack realized that his hunch was correct as he seemed to be getting closer to the car: Both passengers, a boy and a girl anthro wolf, were both screaming at the top of their lungs since the brakes were no longer working!

To make matters worse, the car was approaching a steep hairpin turn, which was taking them towards a bridge over a field. Since the boy had lost control over the vehicle, the car had smashed through the barrier and went airborne, flying through the air before it started to plunge towards the grassy field below, with both passengers screaming as the soaring car spun out of control!

"Tommy! RUN! We need to get to the field so we can catch that falling car!" Jack shouted.

"Gotcha!" he replied.

Then, the girl's seat belt broke loose during the spin, and the girl was hurled from the spinning car. Obviously, she was screaming from the top of her lungs as she was soaring to the ground, realizing she was moments away from smashing into the ground, what would be a certain death!

"GET THE GIRL!" Jack shouted at Tommy. "I'll get the car!"

Jack then ran towards the field and extended his muscular arms towards the sky, positioning himself right under the falling car by running at the same speed as the falling vehicle. As the car came down, he caught it with his arms like a football, holding a firm grip on the chassis of the car as he slowed down the speed until he was able to come to a standstill. He then set the car down and checked up on the teen, who was trembling with fear.

Meanwhile, Tommy ran down the other end of the field and held out his arm, ready to catch the falling female anthro fox. She came soaring through the air, but he was fast enough to catch her in his muscular arms as well. As he held her in his arms, he quickly turned around and raced her back to the car, where Jack was already waiting for them to get back in one piece and... alive!

Jack and Tommy brought the boy and the girl together, after a very scary experience. The front fender of the car was damaged, but the couple was very happy to be alive and well, all thanks to the heroic efforts of Jack and Tommy! This was their first time that they got to work together as superheroes and they had a blast doing it! From that point forward, they decided to help each other even more so!
11531121221.title: Jack and Tommy handle their first emergency tog...

Jack and Tommy play in a baseball game together
11531121222.content:
The following day, during class, Coack Jones spotted Jack and Tommy walking through the hallway. He quickly hobbled over to them and tapped on their shoulders.

"Hey, you two! We're playing the Cavaliers in soccer tomorrow! Be ready! These guys are very fast!"

"No worries, Coach!" Tommy replied. "We'll be even faster!"

Jack just grinned, as the coach walked off. He loved the fact that he now had a friend who was super strong, just like him!

The following day, the boys gathered on the soccer field, and they were all ready to start the match. The Cavaliers seemed all bigger and taller than the Knights, but Jack and Tommy weren't scared.

"We can handle them... Don't worry!" Jack said to Tommy. "Just pass the ball over between us, and score when you can!"

As soon as the referee blew the whistle, Jack immediately raced after the ball, and dribbled the ball towards the Cavaliers' goal using some clever footwork. Three defenders immediately tried to take the ball away from him, but Jack was able to keep possession of the ball. During the second wave of attack, he passed the ball to Tommy, he got even closer to the goal, before passing it back to Jack. They alternated passing the ball back and forth, before Tommy was close enough to score! he fired the ball straight into the goal, totally catching the goalie off-guard! GOALLLL!!!!!

About ten minutes later, Jack and Tommy started a second wave of attacks, and they approached the Cavaliers' goal again. This time, Jack passed the ball to Tommy, who sent it back to Conner, who returned it to Parker, who launched it back to Jack. They kept the ball moving in a big circle until Jack had the right opportunity, and he scored another goal in the right corner of the net! GOALLLLL!!!!

Finally, the Knights beat them 4-0 when the match was over, and Tommy and Jack scored all four goals! They realized that when they worked together, they were truly unstoppable!
11531121222.title: Jack and Tommy play in a soccer team  together.

Jack and Tommy continued playing on the Knights' soccer team, taking the team to their first state Championship, rallying the crowd and all the students behind them!

After soccer season was over, the two boys signed up for baseball season, which started around February, and the coach got them in the starting line-up right away. As soon as practice got started, the coach noticed that Tommy and Jack stood out as being faster and stronger than the rest.

During the first game, when Jack was at bat, he had struck his very first home run of the season on his first pitch! The crowd went wild and the other players were completely awestruck by this amazing feat! The crowd screamed as they saw the ball sail over the highest point of the wall, at the outfield, as the players from the opposing field could do nothing more but stand on the field, in total helplessness, and watch as the ball was smashed out of the ballpark as soon as it was pitched to Jack. Jack casually ran around the three bases before making it over home plate, much to the delight of his teammates!

Tommy didn't want to be outdone by Jack, and he nearly repeated Jack's feat on the first pitch. However, he hit a double right off the bat and made it to second base, paving the way for the other players to assist in the victory. The third player at bat, Jason, scored a run to first base, allowing Tommy to run to third. Finally, Peter came up, and hit the ball to the outfield, which allowed for Tommy to run home!

In the end, the Knights won the baseball game by a final score of 13-0. It was a blowout, all thanks to Jack and Tommy, but they also allowed for the other players to help out as well.

115312.content:
When Jack walked off the soccer field, Tommy, one of the other foxes on the soccer team, sat down on the metal bench next to him.

"Hey, Jack! You were great out there on the soccer field! You're really fast, you know that?" Tommy said.

"Oh, thanks dude!" Jack grinned, as he took a sip from his water bottle. "I appreciate that!"

"Listen, mate... I was wondering... Coach Jones had asked me to sign up for the track and field team as well, since he needed a few new guys to fill in some positions. Since you're pretty fast and quick, why don't you try out for that? I think you'd be pretty good!" Tommy suggested.

"Well, I can certainly run! I mean, if that is all I need to do..." Jack shrugged.

"Absolutely! You go to the track, you line up and you wait for the gun shot and then you run as fast as possible! You stay in your lane and you blast past all the other guys until you see the Finish line! You cross the line and you check your time! That's all there is to it!" Tommy explained. "Plus, I'll be running, too! We only got two guys on the team and we need a fox like you! Why don't you come to the try-outs, which are tomorrow afternoon at the track?"

"I will!" Jack decided. "I'll be there!"

Jack left the soccer field and went home right away. he had some soup for dinner and then he did his homework before he went to bed. The next morning, he got up early and worked out using the snall weght bench in his basement before he showered and got dressed so he could catch the school bus to school. As soon as he arrived at school, he put his books in the locker and he went to class. After class was over, he went to the track, which was just outside the large football stadium. The large track actually circled around the large football field and ran just outside where all the bleachers were.

Tommy was there waiting for Jack, wearing just his shirt and shorts and his running shoes, and he introduced Jack to Coach Jones. Then, the coach took his whistle and told the five boys to get in the start blocks and to line up.

He blew the whistle and the boys were off!

Jack ran as hard as he could, blasting out of the start block with a roar! He raced down the track in a burst of power, cruising down the tracks as the people in the bleachers were looking on. Jack was already passing the 100 meters... 200 meters... 300 meters... And the distance between him and Tommy, who was the next person behind him, was increasing even more, while the other three boys were much farther behind him. At 400 meters, Jack was almost 10 seconds ahead of Tommy and when he crossed the finish line, he was 16 seconds in the lead over Tommy and the other three boys!

"Very good, Jack!" Coach Jones smiled, as Jack crossed the finish line. "Your time is 36.71 seconds! Breautiful time! Tommy is second behind you! I'm proud of you guys!"

Jack and Tommy both smiled, knowing that they had both qualified for the top two positions on the track team for sure! He was glad that he made the team, with his friend.

Jack and Tommy then went to the snack bar to get some cold water to drink, before they walked back to the locker room to change. Their first track meet with another school would be in one week!
115312.title: Jack joins the track team.

Jack and Tommy race in the country
1153122.content:
A few days went by, when Jack was home busy studying hard and writing a paper for school. He was hard at work, looking up information on his laptop for a research paper, when Tommy called him on his cell phone.

"Jack! Remember, we gotta get up at 5 tomorrow to meet at Wakulla Springs at 6 for the race in the woods! It's the 5K race against the boys from River View High School!" Tommy said over the phone.

"Oh, yeah! Well, I'll go to bed early so I'm well-rested for the 5K tomorrow!" Jack said.

Jack went to bed and set his alarm, which woke him up promptly at 5 so he jumped out of bed and slipped into his running shoes and jersey. he then got on his bike and biked over to the park, where he met Tommy. The boys lined up and the flag pole, along with fifty other kids from several other schools, all ready to run in the 5K run in the woods!

The referee shot a gun into the air, and they were off!

Jack and Tommy dashed ahead of the rest as they ran over rocks and into the woods, where they had to run over tree branches, wooden sticks, rough gravel, paved roads, grass, and dirt. They ran uphill and then on a steep downhill incline, going up a mountain and then by the edge of a lake. They ran into the woods and then through a small forrest, surrounded by tons of tall trees and bushes everywhere. They had to follow trees and marked signs, indicating which way to turn and where to go. The worst part was running uphill over a long stretch of rocks, since the road was slippery and didn't allow for anyone to run very fast at all.

Thanks to their teamwork, their perseverence and discipline, Jack and Tommy worked together and remained ahead of the pack! They were numbers 1 and 2 the whole time, beating out runners from all the other schools!

After about thirty minutes, Tommy and jack crossed the finish line! They won! They were greeted by the scorekeeper and the referee who awarded them a certificate and gave them something to drink. They also received a ranking for their efforts in the race!

"Dude! We won!" Tommy said to Jack.

"Yeah... we can now look forward to the next one!" Jack smiled. He was already looking forward to the next competition....

11533.content:
The next day, Jack was walking down the hallway when he saw a poster on the wall. It read "BASEBALL TRYOUTS TODAY". Jack grinned. Baseball was always one of his favorite sports, but he never got the chance to play. But now he could be a great baseball player thanks to his muscles.

After school, Jack walked onto the baseball field where all of the other players were. Most of them stared at him in astonishment, and they started to whisper to each other what they thought his chance was of making the team.

As Jack began to stretch, he heard a shrill whistle blow. Turning towards the sound, he saw that it was Coach O'Neil, the lion who was the varsity baseball coach.

"Alright, we're going to start out with some conditioning, then we'll see how good you are at baseball, and I'll make my decisions. Everyone start running!" barked Coach O'Neil.

Jack soon found out that his sculpted legs gave him insane running speed, and he easily overtook everyone and was way ahead when the running was finished. Jack walked over to Coach O'Neil, who was in shock.

"Alright kid, let's see if you can bat," he said, regaining his composure.

Jack went up to the plate and tapped the ground with his aluminum bat. The pitcher was the starting varsity pitcher, but Jack wasn't afraid.

The pitcher wound up and threw the ball. It was a fastball, straight down the middle. Jack timed it perfectly and swung with all of his might.

CRACK!!!

The ball flew at high speeds, going over the fence and way beyond. It was a home run! The other players cheered wildly as Jack blushed and stretched out his muscles a bit. Coach O'Neil told the pitcher to keep pitching to Jack.

The pitcher kept pitching and Jack kept hitting home runs. No matter what kind of ball it was, fastball, curve-ball, or change-up, Jack smacked it out of the park. He always connected with the ball and rarely didn't hit a home run, and those times it still went over to the outfield. After that, Jack also showed off his unreal skills in fielding and pitching.

Finally, Coach O'Neil called them in and told them who had made the team, which, of course, included Jack. Jack received his jersey (which was XXL) and went home, thinking about how great it was going to be to play.

The next day, Jack's team was playing at bat and the team started out playing their first game at home against a tough team from up north called thee Vipers. These kids were all bigger and taller and stronger than just about all the other players on Jack's team, except for Jack, of course.

The first player came up to bat and scored a run right away and he made it to first base.

The second player came up and also got a base hit, and the first player made it to second while the other player made it to first.

The players on Jack's team got nervous and they realized that they needed some outs to get out of the inning.

The next two players got thrown out and only one more player came up for the Vipers.

The player got a hit and then the bases were loaded for the Vipers.

Jack decided it was time to get the team locked down and he called the group together. They all got together in a huddle and they realized that they needed one more out to get out of the inning. When they got back into position, they threw the last player out, and they threw the balls to third base and second base and they got all three players out!

Jack caught the ball last and he made sure he was the one, as pitcher, to throw the ball to all the bases and to throw all the players out! They tagged all of them out!

Thanks to awesome teamwork, they beat the Vipers and they advanced to the next round!

Jack is approached by a major league scout.
1153311.content:
The very next day, Jack's team was playing against the Titans, a team that was ranked as one of the top teams in the name. The team had been worried, but Jack knew that they could beat the Titans no matter what.

However, the game had been harder then expected. Jack was pitching, and no matter how hard he threw, the Titans always had fast enough reflexes to hit it. Jack's team saw that the Titans were living up to the hype.

However, as Jack came up to bat in the final inning, his team was only down 7-6 and there was a runner on first base. Jack had been up to bat three times before, hitting a solo home run, another home run to score two points, and a long triple that drove in two other players. Jack could see that the opposing pitcher was nervous, and that was exactly what he wanted.

The pitcher wound up and the first pitch was thrown. It looked like it was going in the strike zone, but just barely. Jack didn't want to swing at it, so he let it fly into the catcher's glove.

"Strike one!" the umpire called out.

The catcher threw the ball back to the pitcher as Jack prepared for the next swing, stretching out his glorious muscles (which caused some chatter by the female fans watching). However the next ball came in way too high, so Jack avoided hitting it.

"Ball one!" the ump yelled.

Jack looked at the pitcher, sure that he was going to throw a strike. Sure enough, the pitcher wound up and threw a fastball straight down the middle. Jack was in perfect position, so he swung the bat forward with all his might to meet the ball dead center.

SMACK!!!

The sound of the bat hitting the ball echoed through the baseball diamond as the baseball soared incredibly fast outwards. It quickly passed the infield and went into the outfield, before sailing over the fence for an easy home run. Jack jogged around the bases as the fans cheered wildly. The rest of the team ran out and mobbed Jack at home plate. They had just beat one of the best teams in the country! With Jack, they were unstoppable!

Jack is up to bat to try and win the game.
11533111.content:
Jack walked out onto the pitcher's mound as he and the rest of the team gawked at the size of the crowd in the stadium. There seemed to be more people here than a professional game. It was a little nerve racking for everyone, even Jack.

The regular season ended with Jack's team going undefeated, putting them in the top seed for the state tournament. Through the team's hard work and Jack's leadership, they had won the state championship fairly easily. They moved onto the regional championships, which were a lot harder, but Jack's team still came out on top. Now they were in the national championship game against a top team from across the country.

Of course, the team's victories were helped a lot by Jack. He almost always got a base hit, and he hit home runs half of the time or more. His speed was that of an Olympic track star and he could catch practically any ball. However, Jack was also known as a fantastic pitcher. Through long hours of practice, Jack had mastered his pitching, throwing heat that only the top teams in the country could hope to hit. He had also put on some more muscle (not by the rock, but by hard training in the gym) and was truly an intimidating beast. Despite only being in high school, sports reporters were already discussing his success as a major league player.

The crowd roared wildly as the game started and the first batter came up. Jack noticed that he was fairly muscular, especially for a high school student. In fact, Jack looked over at their dugout and saw that all of their players seemed to be big. They weren't anywhere near Jack's level of muscularity, but they could still pose a threat.

After throwing two strikes and two balls, Jack wound up for a fastball and fired. It seemed to go 100 MPH straight down the middle of the strike zone. The batter wound up and swung quickly.

The ball rocketed over Jack's head and into the outfield as the player sprinted down the base path. The center fielder scooped up the ball and threw it back into the infield. He managed to stop the batter from going any further, but it was still a double. Jack caught the ball thrown to him and turned to face the next batter. He knew this was going to be a long game.

Finally, Jack's team managed to get the three outs, but not without giving up two runs first. The team ran back into the dugout to prepare to bat. Jack was dripping with sweat from the humid night and hard exertion, so he gulped down what seemed like a gallon of water to cool himself off. He knew he had to go quickly because he was the fourth batter up.

Luckily, the team wasn't as good at pitching as they were batting, so two out of the three first batter managed to make it onto base. Jack stepped up to the base, tapped his bat on the ground, and looked at the pitcher. The pitcher seemed especially determined to get Jack out and prove that he was a good pitcher. Jack wasn't going to let that happen.

Luckily, the first pitch was exactly what Jack wanted. It was fairly slow and right down the middle. Jack tensed up in anticipation and let loose on the ball.

The ball curved up and out in a high arc way over the players' heads. Jack jogged to first base, watching the ball closely. The outfielder ran back to try and catch it, but it was no use. The ball sailed far over the fence for a home run.

The crowd cheered as Jack rounded the base and headed to home plate. He had put the team up 3-2. They could really win the championship game! Of course, it was still going to be a long game...

At first, he considered calling a doctor.... but he decided against it. He realized that he didn't have to worry about being picked on anymore. He could take down those bullies with one paw behind his back. The thought made him smile.

Jack decided to head toward the school, as some of the bullies might be working out in the school gym. He walked out the door (nearly breaking the door off of its hinges) and headed toward the school. People look at him in shock. Jack was one of the largest anthros they had ever seen, and it was especially shocking because he was a fox, which are usually scrawny! Jack smirked, liking the new attention.

Jack finally arrived at the school and found his way to the school weight room. He noticed the biggest bully, a large and muscular (but nowhere near as big as Jack was now) bull, who was doing bench presses with his two cronies, who were twin muscular lions, stood by. The bull was doing a 100 lb. bench press, but he gave up after six reps. He held the bar up and dropped it onto the rack... but he didn't hear it hit the metal. Confused, he looked up and gasped as he saw a giant muscular fox holding it aloft with just one paw.

"Who... who are you?" the bull questioned, understandably terrified. Jack dropped the metal bar with a loud clang. "Don't you remember? I'm Jack, the guy you beat up a few hours ago," he said, glaring at the bull menacingly. "But... what about..." the bull didn't even have to finish the question, as he noticed the two lions sprawled out on the floor, nearly unconscious.

The bull looked scared to death now as Jack towered over him. Jack stuck a finger in the bull's muscled chest. "Look," Jack threatened, "I don't want you picking on anyone here anymore, got it?" The bull slowly nodded. "Now get out of here!" Jack yelled. The bull leaped up and took off right out of the gym. “That didn’t sound too good!” Jack mumbled, as he quickly increased the pace and started running towards the direction of the awful sound.

Another fox, which was driving a car, had tried to go through the red light but tried to avoid hitting the lion on the bike, so he veered to the right and ended up smashing the front end of the car into the light post, which was just standing on the side of the lane where the car was driving.

Jack was thinking about his good deeds as he strolled home. His day was going great. He was the strongest anthro alive, and he was saving peoples' lives! He was practically a superhero!

Just then, Jack noticed something in the distance. It looked a thin trickle of smoke. Suddenly, the smoke grew larger and thicker, and Jack realized what was happening. A building was on fire!

Acting quickly, Jack dashed towards the smoke, which was only a few blocks away. Upon reaching the scene, Jack gasped. The building was a large apartment complex, but it was completely engulfed in flames. Anthros were getting out of the building as fast as they could. The fire department had arrived, but the fire was putting up a good fight.

Suddenly, Jack heard a sudden cry from the firefighters. "Someone's still in there!" the fireman shouted. The firefighters were trying to get in, but the flames were too strong for them.

Jack knew he had to help. He sprinted towards the entrance, sidestepping firefighters as he dashed through the door. Jack frantically looked around the level for the victim as the flames grew stronger. Suddenly, Jack heard a cry from the second floor. Intent on saving the person, he sprinted up the crumbling stairs.

As he went up, the flames grew stronger, but Jack knew he couldn't give up, and his muscles gave him better resistance to the fire. After a small time of searching, he heard the cry coming from a room down the hallway. Sprinting and jumping over fallen objects, Jack made it to the room. However, he was annoyed to find a pile of fallen wood blocking the entire doorway.

Cracking his knuckles, Jack pulled back and threw a punch that shattered the wood and sent it flying everywhere, opening a pathway. Jack made his way into the room and spotted the person crying for help. It was a young dog anthro, trapped under a large refrigerator. He was yelling loudly, but it was apparent he was about to go unconscious.

Jack squatted down and grasped the refrigerator, bending the metal in the process. With a grunt, he picked up the refrigerator and casually tossed it aside, then going to pick up the young dog, who had finally gone unconscious. Jack headed back towards the stairs.

However, Jack was disdained to find that the stairs had been blocked off by roaring flames that even Jack knew he couldn't get through, much less the dog in his muscular arms. Jack needed another way out.

That's when Jack spotted the open window on the other end of the hall. He knew it was risky, as he was on the second floor, but it was his only option at that point. Taking a deep breath, he sprinted down the hall and jumped out the window.

Jack tried to position himself so that he would land in a way that wouldn't injure him or the dog. As he landed on the ground, he felt a small shock, but he was surprised as he felt no pain. He laid the dog on the ground as the ambulance pulled up. The firefighters and others came around to congratulate and admire him. Jack was happy for all the attention, but he knew he should leave in case another emergency should pop up.

A large delivery van was careening down the hill at a high rate of speed. It seemed the brakes had given out and the emergency brake wasn't working on the steep incline. The driver was desperately trying to steer the vehicle away from oncoming traffic, but if it went into an intersection there's no telling what accident might happen. If he could bust out a wall, maybe he could pick up the truck's tail end and stop it from moving.

The metal creaks and bends a little in his grasp, as if it's made of wet clay. He steadily slows down from a sprint to a jog to a walk, finally pushing the vehicle onto the sidewalk. The driver, white with fear, stumbles out of the disabled truck and onto the concrete, thankful to be alive.

Jack flashed the weary driver a toothy grin. "No need to thank me," he says, with a powerful flex of his right bicep. Jack felt like he could bench press a battleship and cut gemstones on his impossibly-hard abs. This was great!

"Oops...I'll be a little less forceful." Using his mighty muscles, he punches the larger rocks, and they shatter into rubble. Then, he walks over to the side of the road, and rips a large tree out of the ground. Using the trunk as a bulldozer, he lays it on the ground and pushes it across the road, splintering the wood somewhat but managing to clear the road of several tons of rock before the trunk breaks down. The police officer is astounded. Jack smirks, says "road's clear", and heads on his way.

Before, Skylar would have been a nervous wreck having to come in here, and he had even sprinted past it when he had to walk near it before. However, looking around, he saw that he might even be the biggest man in the gym. However, that didn't mean that the bodybuilders here weren't big. In fact, it was the most muscular group of people he had seen. Huge lions, bulky horses, gigantic dogs, all working out with weights in the tonnage. There were even a few female bodybuilders, and they were probably bigger than some of the men.

Skylar noticed the muscular wolf waving at him from a large table. Skylar walked up and sat down with him, creaking the chair a little even though they were made for large people like him.

The wolf quickly began describing Mr. Gigantic to Skylar. It was a huge competition that would attract the best bodybuilders around. The bodybuilders would be put through a round of posing and strength first. Then, the pool would be cut down to only a select few, who would then participate in a strength obstacle course for the title. The winner would recieve a large trophy, a full weight room set capable of giving him a challenge, and enough money to supposedly set Skylar for life, not to mention the fame that winning a major bodybuilding competition would bring.

Skylar was very intrigued by everything the wolf said, but he couldn't stop glancing at all the gym patrons working out. Sweat running down their face, muscles flex in hard concentration... Skylar wanted to be out there with them, testing and showing off his strength.

At one point, the wolf caught Skylar's eye and looked where he was looking. "Oh, I get it, your muscles want a little exertion, eh? Why don't you show me what you got?" he said.

Excited, Skylar practically leaped up and ran over to the weights, the wolf calmly following him. Skylar decided to start by curling some dumbbells. Since the gym was built for people with insane strength, there were weights there that could satisfy Skylar's needs.

Wanting to start off light, Skylar grabbed a pair of 200 lb. dumbbells off of the rack and started pumping. They were as light as paper to him! Excited, Skylar started pumping faster and faster, enjoying the rush using his muscles gave him.

Skylar put them down and tried 500 lb. dumbbells. He felt a little resistance, but it still wasn't enough, so he set them down and grabbed 1000 lb. dumbbells, which even to this gym were more there to show how heavy it was than actually for someone to use. However, that wasn't stopping Skylar, who quickly pumped out some fairly easy reps before dropping them with a loud BANG. Skylar decided to move on to the weight bench.

The barbell weights were even more eye-popping than the dumbells, but Skylar wasted no time in loading up a bar with 3 tons of weight, attracting a few looks. Skylar was more unsure about this, as the most he had lifted so far was about 2 tons, but he would never know unless he tried. He gathered up all his strength and pushed up, finding, not so surprisingly anymore, he could lift it easily. He set it down with a clank and went to look for more weights.

A few minutes later, Skylar was in the same position only with 5 tons of weight and a couple of interested onlookers waiting to see if he could do it. Some were even taking bets. If Skylar lifted this, he would have broken the gym record.

With a mighty heave, Skylar started pumping the bar up and down, the crowd's cheers invigorating him more. Even this wasn't all that heavy to him. Finally, after 20 reps or so, Skylar decided to put the bar down on the rack and stand up, immdeiately being flooded by bodybuilders giving approval and congratulations, including the wolf.

"That was amazing!" the wolf said. "Those were some heavy weights you were lifting! Even the bodybuilders will be intimidated by you, and you'll tear right through them... kind of like a storm."

"A storm, huh?" Skylar replied. He kind of liked that idea, and it made him sound really cool. Might even make a good stage name...

Skylar then gathered up his things, said good-bye to the wolf, and left the Golden Guns Gym. He was proud of his accomplishment, and wondering how far he could go. He could only hope that Mr. Gigantic would give him a bigger challenge!

The warmth of the fire charmed the wolf immensely. "You're just full of surprises." She remarked. Skylar turned his attention to her. "Good surprises I hope." Some smoke then escaped from his mouth.

"Two days to go. Let's see." Skylar said to himself. He was excited to go. Since his last date with Christen, he pumped up a bit more, mainly due to all the working out he had done since. He bought a home gym with the money he had gotten from the competition. Plus, he made sure that there was enough weight to challenge him. However, challenging Skylar "Storm" Armstrong was not an easy task. He'd finally found his max bench at 15 tons, the weight of a medium sized truck. He also made a friend since the competition. Greg, the dalmatian that won second place. Christen let Skylar bring him up to the cabin. Mainly because he was nice, hot and single. One of her friends has been looking for a boyfriend, and he thought Greg would be the perfect fit. In fact, Skylar was planing on working out with Greg today. Greg was on his way to Skylar's house. He moved out of his parent's house after explaining what happened to him. His parents were unsurprisingly okay with it, mainly because who could say no to Skylar's muscles. Only Greg, the next strongest guy he knew.

Ding Dong! The doorbell rang. Already in his gym shorts, Skylar opened the door. Sure enough, it was Greg, also only in his gym shorts. Although a bit taller than Skylar, Greg's muscles were smaller than Skylar's. Greg was much more lean than Skylar. However, his muscles were not small by any definition of the word. His biceps were 30" the last time he measured them, and his 10 pack was harder than rock. However, Skylar was still bigger. (He had 33" arms for scale). "Ready to work out?" "Of course Sky." Greg called Skylar "Sky" as a nickname. Skylar liked it. The duo went to Skylar's basement, where the exercise equipment was. "What are you doing today?" Skylar inquired. "Abs and cardio. You?" "Same. Let's have a competition for our warm-up." "Sure. What o you have in mind Sky?" "The abs machines, set them to 4 tons, and first to 500 reps wins." "Okay. You're going down Sky!" Greg was excited. "Let's do this." 4 tons for any other person would be too much to crunch, but Skylar and Greg's abs were unmatched by anyone else. In fact, a bull once tried to convince them that he was stronger than the duo. They accepted the challenge. After destroying the bull, he was not happy. He took his extremely muscular arm, and punched Greg as hard as he could. It connected with Greg's abs, which was not good... for the bull. The bull broke his hand on the granite abs of Greg. That's why his show name is Granite Greg. The bull then took his other arm, and punched Skylar. That punch connected with the abs too, causing the other hand to break. The duo laughed as they told the bull the hilarious truth. They were not flexing their abs. They were rock hard on their own. The duo have speculated that when flexed, their abs were bulletproof, but they don't want to try. (For obvious reasons.) "3... 2... 1... GO!" The duo sat up and down at unfathomable speeds, getting each sit up out in seconds. After 10 minutes, Skylar yelled, "Done!" He won. "Damn, I had 470. Next time, I will beat you." They were contest rivals, until they made a truce that they would never partake in the same contest at the same time. "I win, my prize is bragging rights." "Okay, but what to do now. I barely feel warmed up." "How about a jog, for the cardio." "Perfect Sky. Where?" "How about around the city. I know of a good pathway to take." "How many miles?" "150." That's it?" "We're still warming up Greg!" "Oh yeah, I forgot." The duo raced up the stairs and out the door. 150 miles is quite long. However, Skylar and Greg's legs were monstrous. They could keep a constant 100mph without breaking a sweat. The duo decided to jog together. They already had their contest.

After around an hour of light jogging (for them...), they returned to Skylar's house. "That was a good warm up. I feel pumped." Skylar said. His calves agreed to. The diamond shaped muscles were the size of soccer balls, and hard as rock. Greg's were too. "Now, let's make this workout worthwhile." Greg said. "Let's indeed." The duo descended into Skylar's gym, and dispersed. Skylar went to the push up rack to do vertical sit ups while Greg went to the treadmill. They agreed that after an hour, they would switch. Skylar grabbed a barbell, loaded it with 8 tons, and vertically sat up, with the extra weight. Again, this was pretty easy. However, what was not easy was doing it for an hour straight. Greg, on the other hand, set the treadmill to 250 mph, a challenge even for Granite Greg.

250 miles later, Greg stepped off of the treadmill, legs bulging and heart pounding. "Skylar, it's been an hour. i can't do this forever." "One minute, I'm almost done!" Skylar yelled. "I beat my record! I pulled off 3600 reps!" "What was it before?" "3000 in an hour." "Nice. I was able to maintain 250mph for a full hour. That is not easy." "Nice." The two switched positions. Because Greg can't fly onto the bar, he has to do a (very easy) pull up to get into vertical sit up position. What is not easy is getting the bar. Skylar handed him the 8 ton barbell. Then, he got on the treadmill, and ran his heart out. (Get it? Cardio joke. Bad puns are bad.)

One more hour flew by, and Skylar saw what his friend meant. 250 mph for a full hour was not easy at all. As Skylar stepped off the treadmill, Greg got down from the pull up bar. "3500 reps. Record for me too." "Nice Greg. that was a good workout! Shower time. We'll take turns." As Greg was showering, Skylar noticed a new box on his desk. He unwrapped it, and saw a note, and another wooden box, similar to the one that turned him into a dragon. The note said;

"Dear Skylar,
I noticed that you've made a friend. Share your secret with him, and show him this. Don't worry, he won't accuse you of cheating. He will like it."

Skylar then looked at the wooden box. He had no idea what it could do. The first gift made his muscles grow, then he got a species changing box, and finally, the flash that made his muscles grow after a flex. Skylar hesitated to open it. 5 minutes later, he heard Greg open his bedroom door. "Sky, the shower's free. It's your turn." "Greg, there's something I need to tell you. A couple of months ago, I was a skinny 16 year old fox. Then, I got a rock in the mail. When I touched it, it made my muscles grow. Then, I got another package. That one had a box that lets me change into any species. I chose dragon because I like flying around." Skylar showed him the older box. "Then, I got a third one. This time, when I opened it, a bright blue light flashed around me. At first, I thought nothing happened. However, when I flexed my biceps, they got bigger. I could grow by flexing. Now, I just got this one, and I don't know what it does. Since you're here, and the note in it said for me to do this, let's see what it does together." "Okay. That's really cool. So you can grow?" Skylar flexed his legs, and grew to Greg's height, with the rest of his body growing to proportion. (Skylar's arms were now 35") "Cool. Maybe this will let me do that too." "We'll see." Skylar and Greg grabbed the lid of the new box, opened it, and saw a bright flash of light. "What happened Sky?" "I don't know, but I feel weird." All of the sudden, all of Skylar's muscles contracted. "Aarg!" He yelled. After a minute, Skylar regained control of his body. Greg was standing there awestruck. "What?" Skylar asked. "Flex your arm, but don't make it grow." Greg said. Skylar did just that. Then, Skylar felt the 35" ball. It was as hard as a diamond. "It seems to have hardened and strengthened my muscles." Then, Greg's muscles contracted and grew. Soon, they were Skylar's size. "Whoa. That was weird." "Come with me to my gym. I want to see something." Skylar walked to the barbells, and loaded it with as much as he could put on. 50 tons. He then tried to bench it. It was easy as pie. "That box made us much stronger!" A note suddenly appeared. It said, "5 times stronger to be exact. Also, to answer your question. Yes, your muscles are bulletproof. Now you don't need to flex them to make that true." "So Sky, if this note is saying what I think it's saying, our muscles are bulletproof when unflexed, and we're five times stronger then when you were after growing?" "It seems so. Grab that other barbell, and put 50 tons on it. Greg did, handed it to Skylar, and he benched the two bars. He found his new max. 100 tons. "Sky, this is awesome. Anyway, see you Friday!" "Bye Greg." The dalmatian left, and Skylar took his long overdue shower.

After the eventful workout with Greg, Skylar felt refreshed. Unfortunately, his clothes did not feel the same way. After his growth, none of his clothes fit. Off to the store with him. He waltzed over to his closet, put on his largest clothes, and flew to the Big and Tall store. After all, Skylar was the current definition of big and tall.

As Skylar searched for clothes in the store, he ran into a familiar face. "Hey Greg. Long time no see." Skylar said jokingly. Greg was only wearing his gym shorts, because none of his shirts fit. The store let him in because he explained what happened to them. "Hey Sky. After that workout, none of my clothes fit, so here I am." "Same." The muscular duo spoke for a while, and decided to look for clothes together, seeing how they were both the same size. After much searching, the duo found the largest clothing the store had. "Wow, I didn't know you could fit that many X's onto a shirt tag!" Greg said as he picked up an XXXXXXXL shirt and put it on. "How do I look?" The shirt was pretty snug around Greg's enormous pecs, but it held together. "You look good." "Yeah, but it feels tight. Oh well. Do they have any bigger sizes?" "I'll look." Skylar walked over to the stand with the biggest sizes, where he saw another note. "I've been getting a lot of these lately. Greg, come here! Another note." "What does it say?" Skylar cleared his throat. "Dear Skylar and Greg. Don't worry about the clothing. Check your closets, and you will find everything you will need." "Well Sky, that's convenient." "Hang on, wait here for a minute, I'll be back." Skylar rushed out of the store, and flew home to check his closet. Sure enough, new clothes filed the small room. He put on a T-shirt and shorts which thankfully fit perfectly, and flew back. "Greg, these appeared in my closet. And I have the feeling that they will grow whenever we do. That's nice." "But, I like flexing out of clothes." "There's more on the note. 'Don't worry Greg, if that is your intention with some articles, they will tear, and be replaced in your closet." "Perfect. I get to show off my muscles without wasting clothes for once. Anyway, it seems that our work here is done. Bye Sky!" "Bye Greg." Skylar flew back home.

He then spent the next half hour posing in front of his mirror. He loved his vascular muscles. They were as ripped as possible, seeing how he had exactly 0 grams of fat on his 700 pound frame. Then, Skylar thought of something he'd never done. Measure himself. He wondered how big his muscles actually were. He worked out all of his muscles a bit to get them pumped, and then measured. He found very pleasing results. 35" arms, 25" forearms, 80" chest, 42" waist, 48" thighs, and 34" calves. On top of that, each muscle was as hard as diamond. Skylar loved his body, almost as much as he loved Christen. Skylar smiled as he bounced his vascular, striated pecs. Then he tensed his arms, looking at the striated, vascular horseshoe shaped triceps. There was not a single muscle on his body that did not have veins popping out at some time. Even without flexing, all of his muscles were perfectly defined and vascular.

Grumble Grumble. Skylar felt his stomach groan. He was hungry. "Hmm, I have not had eggs in a while." Skylar walked to his fridge, got out some onions, cheese, sausage, bacon, and eggs. He then took all 12 eggs, a pound of bacon, cheese and sausage, and some chopped onion, and mixed them into the super omelet. A big guy like Skylar needs a lot of food. On top of that, all the cholesterol and fat in it would go away because of Skylar's metabolism. It is as fast as light. Doctors said that it was physically impossible for Skylar not to be in perfect health, unless he was killed in some sort of explosion. No matter what he ate, his heart would be fine, and his bodyfat would stay 0. Another perk of being a muscle monster he guessed. The only issue was the amount of money it cost to offset his appetite. Thankfully, his sponsors and contest wins made him rich. Skylar's life was perfect in his eyes.

Nothing noteworthy happened for the rest of the day. Skylar just jacked his suitcase, and left to meet Greg and Christen. "Hey Skylar." Christen said. "Hey Christen! It's been a while." "I know. I was just getting stuff together in the cabin itself. You look different." "Yeah, I'll tell you about it later. It's a long story. But to make it short, magic stuff made me grow and strengthened me, a lot." "Tell me in the car. It's a long drive, and I know you don't know where the cabin is, so no flying. Anyway, where is this friend of your's." All of the sudden, Greg arrived. "Hi. You must be Christen. Sky told me all about you. I'm Greg." "Skylar was right, you are hot. I have a friend who's dying to meet you. She's meeting us at the cabin. Anyway, get your stuff in the car, and let's go." The three walked to Christen's car, put their suitcases in the trunk, and left.

"Now, what happened since I last saw you?" "Well Christen, here's the scoop." Skylar explained the notes and gifts he'd received over the past months. "I see, so a couple of months ago, you were a wimpy fox, and now you are the strongest dragon ever?" "Pretty much." "This was an interesting year for you so far, wasn't it?" "Yes, but it has been awesome. Plus, without those notes and gifts, I would have never met you." "Aww!" "Guys, while you two were gushing at each other, we got a flat tire." "Oh no! I don't have a spare." Don't worry, leave it to Greg and me. The two muscle behemoths got out of the car, and lifted it with Christen still inside it. "Where are we going?" "As you run, I'll give directions. Isn't this heavy Sky?" "To me, this feels like lifting a feather." "Wow, you are strong. Which reminds me, we need firewood at the cabin. Could you get us some when we get there?" "Sure. Let's go." Skylar ran according to the highway speed limits, which was quite difficult. It felt like a snail's pace.

After a while, the three made it to the cabin. "I'll call car maintenance, you guys get firewood." Christen said. The duo went into the woods, and tried to find sticks on the ground. "Wait a minute. Greg, I have an idea." "Oh god, what is it Sky?" "We pull up a tree, bring it to the house, and chop it with our bare hands. No wonder why Christen wants us to do it, and why she thought about it while I picked up the car." "OK, let's try this tree." It was huge. The tree was at least 50 feet fall, and it's trunk was big enough for both of the guys to hug it, and barely reach the other's hand. "On three, we lift. One, two, three." The tree was uprooted. It then fell down. The two picked the tree up, and walked over to the cabin. There, they saw Christen talking to another girl. "The tire's fixed now. I see you guys got some wood." "Only a little." Skylar said as he put down the heavy tree. Skylar, I would like you to meet Brittany. Brittany, this is Skylar Armstrong." "Nice to meet you Skylar. "Nice to meet you too Brittany." Brittany was a 5'10 leopard, and she was gorgeous. However, after looking at her, Skylar could not figure out why she was single. Then it hit him, she couldn't find the right guy. "So Christen, is this the guy you told me about?" "No, Skylar's mine. Skylar's friend on the other hand is single too." "Hi, I'm Greg." Greg said as he shook Brittany's hand. "Hi, I'm Brittany." "Ok, it's been a long day. Let's have dinner!"

As Christen and Skylar cooked, Brittany and Greg bonded. "It seems operation "Get Our Friends in Relationships", or Operation GOFIR worked." Skylar said jokingly to Christen. "It sure did." All of the sudden, Skylar heard, "After dinner, maybe we can show you what these can do." Greg said as he flexed a giant bicep. Brittany looked excited. "It seems that the two of us are going to be putting on a show after dinner. Do you mind?" "Mind seeing my boyfriend be super strong? Why would I mind that?" "Good point." A smile appeared on Skylar's face. Christen called him her boyfriend. This relationship was officially official.

"That was delicious Christen!" Skylar said, turning to his girlfriend. "Thank you. I'd always wished that I could have become a chef, but it never worked." She replied. "Sky! Don't you think we should prepare for our show?" Greg interjected. "Yeah. See you in a bit." Skylar and Greg rushed off into the backyard of the cabin, and began to work on their show. "I think out muscles should be a tad bigger for this, don't you think?" Skylar asked. "I think your right." Greg answered. The two then used their flex-growth powers. All of the sudden, a note appeared. "Dear Skylar and Greg. Don't worry about people noticing the size difference. They will believe you were always the size you grew to." "That works for me. Less questions." They both said in unison. They made each muscle 25% bigger, and grew to a solid 7'7". Then, the began working on their show.

One hour later.

Christen and Brittany heard a whistle. They knew that this meant that their boyfriends were ready. The two beauties walked outside and sat on some lawn furniture. "Hello, and welcome to the first ever 'Muscle Show'! Featuring Skylar 'Storm' Armstrong and 'Granite' Greg Aberforth." Greg yelled. He was only wearing posing trunks, showing off every single one of his ripped, vascular muscles. The show was about to begin. "First, we will need one volunteer. Who will it be. How about the leopard!" Brittany got out of her seat, and approached Greg. "Now miss, tell me your name." "Brittany." Brittany was excited. "Brittany, what I want you to do is take the tape measure that I am holding in my hand, and try to circle it around my bicep. Can you do that for me?" "YES YES YES!" Brittany screamed. She has been waiting for the chance to feel Greg's diamond bicep. Greg flexed the mountainous arm, and Brittany tried to circle the tape around it. However, the tape measure was not long enough to encircle the whole muscle. "How much is it?" "I don't know, it won't fit." "Funny, that tape is 3 feet long. Oh well. It's pretty useless now." Greg relaxed the muscle, shrinking it down to 30". Brittany then circled the tape around it, and Greg flexed, destroying the tape. "40" of bicep right there. I can guarantee you will never see an arm this big." "OR CAN YOU!" In the blink of an eye, Skylar landed in front of Greg, and flexed his 40" bicep. "I guess you're wrong. This cabin is only big enough for one muscle man. Who will win?" Brittany sat down, and realized that this show was a mock challenge between the two strongest men in the world. "IT IS ON" Greg shouted. He then walked over to the nearest tree, and uprooted it like a weed. "Beat that!" "Okay," Skylar retorted. He took the tree from Greg, and held it with one hand. "Beat that." "I think these trees are too light for me. Where can I find something heavy enough? I know." Greg ran off at unfathomable speeds. "Where do you think your going." Skylar chased after him.

5 minutes later, both of them returned, carrying giant boulders 5 times larger than themselves. "I think lifting is out of the question. These things were 20 miles away. I don't want to leave the show, again." Skylar said. "Then how do we settle this?" Greg asked. "An arm wrestle." "Perfect." The two muscle behemoths sat on the ground, set their elbows on a tree stump, and began an arm wrestle. Their biceps growing to their beautiful 40" peaks. After 5 minutes of intense arm wrestling, neither arm budged. "It seems we're equal. Well, this is awkward. Let's just be friends." "Okay" The two pumped men hugged each other, and left their performing space. Then, Skylar walked back on. "Time for a posing show! I will begin it." Skylar started to pose, showing off his 40" biceps, 32" forearms, 100" chest, 45" waist, 60" thighs, and 43" calves. Then, he flexed his prized possession. His (now) 12 pack abs. "Would you girls like to feel the diamonds?" Skylar asked. "Okay." They said. The two pushed on the abs as hard as they could, but neither of them could dent them. "Hey! Stop hogging them!" Greg yelled. All of the sudden, he ran into the performing area, loaded a shotgun, and shot Skylar point blank in the abs. The girls were horrified, until Skylar stepped away unfazed. "That tickled!" He said. Greg laughed along. "I know. I just wanted to scare them a bit. Anyway, my turn." Greg then took center, and posed for the girls. Greg was just as built as Skylar, same measurements and everything.

After the show, it was time for bed. Skylar and Christen shared a room, and Greg and Brittany shared one. "Christen, I think we have another couple here." Skylar said to his girlfriend. "That it does. At least I have my big dragon. You are so big and strong. I do wonder, how strong is my boyfriend?" Christen asked. "Last I checked, I could bench 100 tons, but that was a long time ago. Now, probably double that." Skylar estimated. "That is a lot. I love you Skylar." Christen said. "I love you too. Let's go to sleep."

The next morning.

"So, when will your next bodybuilding show be?" Brittany inquired. "Well, my agent has not contacted me about any gigs yet, but hopefully soon." Greg responded. "What about you Skylar?" Christen chimed in. "In one month. Ever since Greg and I became friends, we made a pact to never compete in the same show. I stick to Mr. Humongous and Strongman's Challenge, and Greg sticks to The Great Muscle Show and Professional Mr. Gigantic. The one that you met me during was the Amateur Mr. Gigantic. In fact, I met Greg during that one. The professional version is much more competitive. However, aside from when I beat Greg that one time, we are both undefeated. Anyway, Mr. Humongous is in one month, and after this vacation, It'll be gym time for me." "I can't wait to come." "Me too." "Same."

Nothing happened for the rest of the weekend. The 4 mostly talked, got to know each other more, and grew closer to their significant others.

Back at Skylar's home... "I do wonder how much stronger I've become since I grew at the cabin. To find out, I'll need new equipment." Another note appeared. "Weird, this is the fourth one this week." "Dear Greg and Skylar. I've fitted both of you with new gym equipment. And Skylar, Greg got an identical message. Don't worry about him not knowing." RING RING RING. Skylar's cell phone began to ring. It was Greg. "Hey Greg." "Sky, I'm guessing you got the note about the equipment too." "Yep, I was about to try it out. You want to try with me?" "Can't. Going out with Brittany. Anyway, talk to you later." "Bye Greg." Beep. Skylar grinned and flexed a bicep. "Let's see what these can really do."

Skylar descended the staircase into his basement gym, and noticed many differences. Instead of free weights, there were electronic machines with bars for every exercise. There was also a new treadmill that looked that it could handle any speed. On top of that, there was a large tube that read, "Full Body Measurement Device and 360 Mirror". "I can live with this." Skylar commented. He then changed into his workout attire, otherwise known as his running shorts and shoes. He started on the Bench. Instead of setting a weight, it said to set a percentage, between 1 and 100. Skylar set it to 100, and started to bench. It was the first time he could only get one rep in. "Strange. How much weight was that?" Skylar looked at the screen, pushed the button that said "Equivalent Weight", and read the number. 500 tons. "Holy crap. That's huge. What else can I do." He then walked over to the squat bar, and repeated the routine. His 100% weight was 750 tons. He repeated this for deadlift, curls, tricep extensions and lat pull downs. He found his max weights were 800 tons, 400 tons, 500 tons and 400 tons respectively. He then went to the sit up machine, set the weight to 100 tons, and just started. His goal was to fatigue his abs. One hour and 4000 sit ups later, his abs barely felt warmed up. After a total of 6 hours and 24000 sit ups, Skylar felt a burn in his abs. It took another 1.5 hours and 6000 sit ups to feel truly fatigued. At 100 tons, it took 30000 sit ups to fatigue him. That's why Skylar's abs are world famous. For some reason, Skylar's abs were much stronger than the rest of his muscles. He did not test it, but he could perform a set of 20 sit ups with the weight set to 10000 tons. Skylar's final test was running/flying. He knew that his top speed was the same for both running and flying, but he did not know that speed. Setting the treadmill to 100%, Skylar ran for 10 minutes. After getting off, he noted the speed. Mach 1, the speed of sound. "I like this. I can get used to this." Skylar bragged to himself while flexing his ridiculously pumped muscles. He stepped into the tube, and checked himself out. "Looking as awesome as ever Storm. Mr. Humongous judges, say hello to the strongest man in the world." He stepped out, and noticed the screen. It read as follows:

Subject: Skylar 'Storm' Armstrong.
Height: 7'7"
Weight: 1 ton.
Muscle Hardness: Hardest thing known to science.
Biceps: 42"
Forearms: 32"
Chest: 104"
Waist: 45"
Thighs: 62"
Calves: 45"
Abs: 12-pack

After his measurements, it showed the max lifts he just performed. "Through my testing, I grew. I think I am big enough now." Skylar said to himself. The screen changed its message to this after he said that: "Okay, you will stop flex-growing until you change the settings on this machine." "That works for me. Anyway, I'm ready for my show."

Figuring his shirt might just be making him sweat, he pulled it up over his face to reveal his bare chest. By coincidence, he happened to be standing in front of a full length mirror, and the reflection he saw caused him to gasp in awe.

Instead of the flat, scrawny chest he was used to seeing whenever his shirt was off, Jack could swear he saw actual... pecs forming two identical mounds on his torso. Curiosity overcoming him, Jack reached up and rubbed his new pectorals, eventually pushing down on them. He was amazed at how soft and fluffy, yet firm they were. He managed to snap out of his daze long enough to notice that his stomach felt a little heavier too. Another quick feeldown revealed a subtle but very much present six-pack of model-like abdominals that had suddenly appeared on the young fox's belly.

Suddenly, Jack felt another jolt run through his body similar to the previous one. He began to sweat even more. What was going on? And why? However, Jack had no time to even ponder the answers before an intense swelling filled his muscles, nearly causing him to double over in pain.

Jack stared at his reflection in shock. Was it... growing? No, that was impossible, it took years of working out at the gym to get your muscles up to a big enough size... at least, that's what he thought until his pecs bloated out 4 inches in front of his faces, not even stopping there before reaching the size of basketballs and beyond.

He was in such shock that he didn't even notice his arms until they started pushing up against his sides. He raised up the right one, giving an involuntary flex of the car tire sized monster. Jack wanted to say something about this, but it was so amazing he was at a loss for words.

Jack wasn't even sure how much time passed, but after a while he began to cool down and the growth slowed to a stop. Though he didn't remember going down, Jack found himself on his knees, panting from exhaustion. Slowly but surely, he stood up, trying his best to keep calm as he turned back to the mirror.
All thoughts of staying calm were gone once he saw his reflection. He was HUGE! Not just bodybuilder huge or even powerlifter huge, but more like Hercules or Greek god type of insane strength. He had to be at least 8 feet and 700 pounds of muscle by what he could guess. His pecs were so huge they were touching his chin, and the giant valley in between them could probably crush a boulder. Speaking of boulders, that was a good estimate for how big his biceps were, considering he was having trouble even lowering them.

Jack could only grin as the heat and exhaustion was replaced by sheer power and adrenaline. He was probably - no, he WAS - the most powerful creature on the planet. Nothing could stop him. His muscles yearned to be used, to show off their true power. But he still needed to figure out just what was going on.
Jack figured that a walk would help him clear his thoughts and figure out the source of this incredible act. By some insane miracle, his pants had managed not to burst off of the rippling calf muscles beneath them, but they were still very small and restricting. Jack picked up his shirt, which was now only as big as his two paws put together, and slipped it back over his head. It took several minutes to squeeze on, and it didn't even cover up his stomach at all, but it was the best he could do for now.

Unknown confidence running through him, Jack ducked under the doorway and out into the world, wondering what he could do with his new power and, most importantly, why and how he had it.

151.content:
Jack took a deep breath and inflated his already massive chest. With his new look, it was going to be a great day. He could feel it. As he took his first step out of the house, he heard a large thump where he place his foot down. When he lifted it, Jack noticed a foot-shaped indentation in the concrete! Jack was amazed by it but he just shrugged at it as if it was nothing and said to himself, "I guess I don't know my own strength." He then walked to the city as if nothing happened.



Jack loved the attention he was getting as he walked through the streets. People's mouths literally dropped as they saw a giant fox strolling down without a care in the world. Jack couldn't help but put a smirk on his face. His ears perked up as he looked over a construction site. He saw some bulldogs standing near some demoliton machines looking distressed. "What do you mean the machines aren't working?" Said one bulldog. "I mean they're not working," Said the other. "I tried starting all of them but they're not moving!" "This is ridiculous!" Said the first bulldog. "We won't get paid if we don't get this done today! What are we going to do?" Jack looked down at his fist and involuntarily thickened his bicep. Time to see what those muscles can do. Jack thumped to the bulldogs' position.



"Do you guys need some help?" Asked Jack in a new, deep voice. The bulldogs looked up to see a giant fox that looked like he wanted to eat them. They were scared at the sight of him. They were as scared as they were envious of his strength. "Umm...We're having trouble starting our machines here," Said one bulldog. "If we don't tear this building down, we're not going to get paid." Jack instantly knew what to do. He cracked his knuckles and neck and said, "Leave it to me." Before the bulldogs could ask what he was planning, Jack ran in lightning speeds towards the building.



Jack clenched his fist while running and slammed against the base of the building. A huge chunk of it went flying from Jack's position. Both he and bulldogs were amazed. After seeing how much strength he had, Jack pumped himself with excitement and began to hit faster and harder. The building began to tilt as its support thinned within less than a minute. Jack gave it the final blow and the building came tumbling down towards the bulldogs.



The bulldogs were too scared to move.They couldn't move out of way in time if they could. Jack sprinted once more and, without thinking, he grabbed them and raced to the street. They both watched as the building came tumbling down. "Thanks," Said one bulldog. "We owe ya." Jack grinned and said,"Don't mention it. Sorry I couldn't be more careful." "That was amazing," Said the other bulldog. "Where did you come from and where did you get muscles like that?" Jack was reluctant to lie but he didn't know what else to do. "I just work out a lot." He simply implied. "Well, it looks like you've been working out for several years!" Jack flexed a giant and veiny bicep and said, "Thanks."
